questions.question: What is the chemical formula for propyne and propylene mentioned in the study?
What is the name of the ultrastable fluorinated anion cross-linked MOF reported for simultaneous benchmark propyne recovery and propylene purification?
What are the two distinct binding sites for C3H4 adsorption in ZNU-2 as revealed by the modelling study?
questions.answer: One serves as a tailored single C3H4 molecule trap and the other boosts C3H4 accommodation by cooperative host–guest and guest–guest interactions.

questions.question: How does the C3H4 storage capacity of ZNU-2 at 0.01 bar and 298 K compare to other anion pillared MOFs?
questions.answer: ZNU-2 has the highest low pressure (0.01 bar) capacity of C3H4 among all the anion pillared MOFs.

questions.question: True or False: The adsorption heat (Qst) for C3H4 in ZNU-2 is higher than most MOFs for C3H4/C3H6 separation.
What is the significance of the symmetrical spatial distribution of six TiF6 2- pillars on the icosahedral cage surface of ZNU-2?
questions.answer: It provides two distinct binding sites for C3H4 adsorption, enhancing the separation performance.

questions.question: True or False: ZNU-2 exhibits excellent recyclability and high productivity for polymer-grade C3H6 from a 1/99 C3H4/C3H6 mixture.
What is the role of the contracted necks in the structure of ZNU-2?
questions.answer: They may provide different diffusion kinetics for molecules with different shapes and diameters.

questions.question: True or False: The C3H4/C3H6 separation performance of ZNU-2 was only demonstrated by simulated breakthroughs.
What is the calculated isosteric heat of adsorption (Qst) for C3H4 in ZNU-2?
How does the C3H4/C3H6 selectivity of ZNU-2 compare to ZIF-8 and Cu-BTC?
questions.answer: The selectivity for 1/99 C3H4/C3H6 in ZNU-2 is higher than those of ZIF-8 and Cu-BTC.

questions.question: True or False: The adsorption rate of C3H4 in ZNU-2 is significantly slower than that of C3H6.
What is the productivity of C3H6 from a 10/90 C3H4/C3H6 mixture using ZNU-2?
True or False: ZNU-2's performance in C3H4/C3H6 separation is unaffected under humid conditions.
What is the experimental productivity of C3H6 from a 1/99 C3H4/C3H6 mixture using ZNU-2?
True or False: The C3H4/TIFSIX ratio in ZNU-2 indicates that every free F site can bind more than one C3H4 molecule.
How does the stability of ZNU-2 compare to other MOFs?
questions.answer: ZNU-2 is extremely chemically and thermally stable, more so than most MOFs.

questions.question: True or False: The C3H4 storage capacity of ZNU-2 at 1 kPa is lower than that of SIFSIX-3-Ni.
What is the BET surface area of ZNU-2?
True or False: The pore size distribution of ZNU-2 is highly close to the calculated pore aperture from its single-crystal structure.
